TN.content: so Nancy partagerait (would shares out and part) the senses, touching too; he does this by adding definite article “le” to toucher, then declaring there’s no “the touch”; Derrida compares this to propre, proche, même; then asks how we could write w/out them, without making believe we believe? asking the other to believe > le temps d’une rature qui viendra signer l’acte de foi partagée et partager (diviser, inquiéter, morceler) l’acte de foi, la foi même?
